overview: Cross-campus pursuits. Bathroom Stall sex. Amateur philosophy. Just another day in the Alaska Statham County University Consortium Library. "Checked Out" follows four student librarians during a single shift. A movie about screwing around at work, and the choices we make in our lives.  Director  Bryant Mainord  Writer  Bryant Mainord  Stars  Jill DerrickMike SherryPaul Rufus Jones
title: Checking Out
